vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrance.withdrawBalance (patch_9.sol#16-25):
	External calls:
	- ! msg.sender.call.value(balanceToWithdraw)() (patch_9.sol#21-23)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_9.sol#24)
